tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE modifications (
    modification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    modification_type VARCHAR(255),
    modification_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CropPestResistance (
  CropID UUID,
  PestID UUID,
  ResistanceLevel INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (CropID) REFERENCES CropGeneticModifications(CropID),
  FOREIGN KEY (PestID) REFERENCES PestInfo(PestID)
);

CREATE TABLE CropGenes (
  gene_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name TEXT,
  crop_name TEXT,
  resistance_trait TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Pesticides (
  pesticide_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  pesticide_name TEXT,
  target_crop TEXT,
  target_pest TEXT,
  application_method TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE GeneSequence (
  sequence_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_id UUID REFERENCES CropGenes(gene_id),
  sequence_data TEXT,
  sequence_length INT
)

CREATE TABLE FieldTrials (
  trial_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id UUID REFERENCES CropGenes(gene_id),
  pesticide_id UUID REFERENCES Pesticides(pesticide_id),
  trial_date DATE
)
CREATE TABLE Crop {id INT PRIMARY KEY, name STRING NOT NULL, modification_type STRING, pest_resistance_level STRING, modification_date DATE
